H0.text: By what name is Siddhartha Gautama better known. Buddha

A4.text: Siddhartha Gautama is better known as the Buddha.

A5.text: The term 'Buddha Shakyamuni' is used in historical inscriptions to refer to Siddhartha Gautama.

A6.text: the Tathagata, the term Gautama uses most often to refer to himself
